name="ChargeProfileID" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ID of the charge profile assigned to the identity for the product</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> product for the identity. 01:Active 02:Suspended 03:Closed</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Question"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>问题项标识符，大小写敏感, 取值如下: verify.secretWord verify.accountBalance verify.transAmount verify.transCreditParty [KYC][KYC Group Name][KYC Field Name]</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="64"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:choice minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>根据Question，输入对应的问题答案项</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="Answer"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>secretWord和KYC的答案在这个参数里表示,大小写不敏感。如果认证的是证件类型+证件号，则取值按IDType_IDNumber拼好的值传入</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="256"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AccountBalance"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>账户余额</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="AccountType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>AccountType alias</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength <xs:element name="TransactionAmount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>最近5笔交易任意一笔交易金额</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="AccountType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>AccountType alias</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="128"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="18"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element Its value must match the inputted value of the parameter IdentifierType.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence>
